snippet: SONNENKLAR--Eric Gordon, 44 years old. Passed away suddenly on the morning of January 13, 2016. Devoted husband of Lisa. Adored father of Harris and Nicolas. Cherished son of Susan and the late Dr. Norman Sonnenklar. Beloved brother of Alan and Jill. Loving uncle of Jacob, Adam, Noah, Sam, Alessandro and Luke. He will be with us forever in our hearts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SONNENKLAR--Eric Gordon, 44 years old. Passed away suddenly on the morning of January 13, 2016. Devoted husband of Lisa. Adored father of Harris and Nicolas. Cherished son of Susan and the late Dr. Norman Sonnenklar. Beloved brother of Alan and Jill. Loving uncle of Jacob, Adam, Noah, Sam, Alessandro and Luke. He will be with us forever in our hearts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SONNENKLAR, ERIC GORDON
